title: Referral Program on BALL
subtitle: Earn rewards by referring friends and family to join the BALL community.

steps.title: Share Your Referral Link
steps.description: Share your unique referral link with friends, family, and colleagues who are interested in owning their dream home. Your referral link can be found in your BALL account dashboard or profile settings.

steps.title: Invite Others to Join
steps.description: Encourage others to sign up for BALL using your referral link. Highlight the benefits of joining BALL, such as access to quality homes, flexible payment plans, and exclusive rewards.

steps.title: Earn Referral Bonuses
steps.description: Earn referral bonuses for every successful referral who signs up and makes payments on BALL. Your bonuses may be credited to your account or provided as cash rewards, depending on the referral program terms.

steps.title: Track Your Referrals
steps.description: Track the status of your referrals and bonuses earned through your BALL account. Monitor the progress of each referral and stay updated on the rewards you've earned for helping others on their homeownership journey.

steps.title: Share Success Stories
steps.description: Share success stories of referrals who have successfully joined BALL and achieved their homeownership goals. Inspire others to take action and join the BALL community by showcasing the positive impact of the referral program.

steps.title: Continue Referring
steps.description: Keep referring friends, family, and acquaintances to join BALL and reap the rewards of the referral program. With each successful referral, you not only earn bonuses but also contribute to expanding the BALL community.
